title: Pixel 2 Battery Drain: Battery Usage Screen Percentages don't add up
content:
I've noticed my phone's battery depleting faster than it used to (before upgrading to Android 10). I have taken the following steps (as seen in other threads):
Clear Google cache and restart
Restrict Location permissions where appropriate
Update system & Google Play (and restart)
Ensure all apps are up to date (they are, automatic update is on)

Now I want to see if some rogue app caused this, but when I go into the battery usage the percentages don't add up (even when viewing "full device usage"). This has been observable over multiple full charge cycles.

Battery Usage:
Screen 9%
Fire Emblem Heroes 3%
Phone idle 3%
YouTube 2%
Wi-Fi 1%
Android System 1%

However the battery is sitting at 53%. If the above is true I should have 81% battery, so clearly this is wrong. Where is this massive discrepancy coming from?
